page.title: 13Playground Games in Wigan
page.content: In our school playground there are lots of different games played. The girls like to skip or play "two balls". As we skip we usually sing a rhyme. Here is one rhyme we sing:- Sally in the kitchen, Doing a bit of stitching, In came a bogey man, And knocked Sally out. The boys like playing ball games like football and rugby. Cops and robbers is also a popular game. In this game there are two sides the cops and the robbers. The robbers have to go and "rob a bank" and the cops have to try and catch them. "Ticky" is also very popular. One person is "it" and he has to try to touch the other players. If he ticks them they are "it". Junior 2, St. Mark's.
